project_background_content: With the maturity and widespread application of blockchain technology, features such as decentralization, security, transparency, and immutability have gradually been recognized by the financial industry. This has opened up opportunities to explore the applications of blockchain in the financial sector, providing a technical foundation for the birth of the decentralized Tobacco bank project.
project_introduction_content: The decentralized Tobacco bank was launched by the Tobacco Global Foundation and dozens of international technology enthusiast groups around the world. It uses the open, transparent, and immutable technology of blockchain to completely change people's thinking about traditional financial pawnshops along with AI artificial intelligence and large companies. data Cloud computing data analysis creates a new digital asset banking system and flexible digital financial services. TOBACCO will open executive offices in major financial centers around the world such as Asia, Europe, South America, and the Middle East.
vision_and_values_content: Through decentralized architecture, customers' money will receive a higher level of security and eliminate the single point of failure risk of traditional banks. Connecting the future and creating freedom: Our mission is to connect people with financial freedom and make financial services more inclusive and equitable. Decentralized banks integrate blockchain technology to break geographical limitations and enable financial services to connect seamlessly worldwide. Everyone has equal rights to participate in financial activities, and decision-making power lies in the hands of many holders, making financial activities more democratic.
